title: Support
subtitle: We're here to help you get the most out of YearWheel
careMessage: Your feedback and questions are important to us. Whether you're experiencing technical issues, have questions about features, or just want to share your thoughts, we're here to listen and help.
responseTimeMessage: We strive to respond to all inquiries as quickly as possible, often within 24 hours. During business days, you can expect even faster responses.
additionalInfo: When contacting us, please include as much detail as possible about your issue or question. Screenshots and step-by-step descriptions help us assist you more effectively.
testingOptOutMessage: If you wish to opt out from testing the YearWheel app or the Google Add-on, please contact us at the email above and we'll process your request immediately.
